Player History
Drafted in 6th round, 93rd overall pick, by Chicago in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/2/2015, off Steven Lawrence (SLB)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/9/2015, off Donald Keough (BOS)...
Signed as a free agent by Montreal on 2/2/2017 to a 4-year deal worth $4,750,000 per year...
Injured on 9/22/2017 with a Strained Abdominal Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Drove in 6 runs against Atlanta on 6/25/2018...
Injured on 7/17/2019 with a Inflamed Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 6 weeks...
Injured on 6/13/2020 with a Scratched Cornea Eye, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Cincinnati on 2/5/2021 to a 1-year deal worth $3,350,500 per year...
